Viewing Service Engine Statistics

For each service engine, you can view such information as message throughput and whether any errors have occurred.

Be sure to work with members of the application team to understand what constitutes normal behavior for the application.

The Composite Application Manager provides two views of the statistics:

  • The tabular view shows the information in a table.

  • The graphical view shows the information in charts. You can select the type of chart, add a three-dimensional effect, and switch between horizontal and vertical orientation.

The statistics are divided into web service endpoints that provide a service and web service endpoints that consume a service.

You can see how many requests have been received and sent, and how many errors occurred.

To display service engine statistics

  1. In the left pane, select a service engine.

  2. In the right pane, click the Statistics tab.

  3. To switch between the views, click Show Graphical View and Show Tabular View.
